Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the astraction of the checkerboard

      • movePiece

        public boolean movePiece​(int direction)
        Moves a piece on the board
        Parameters:
        direction - int that specifies the direction (0 = down, 1 = right, 2 = up, 3 = left)
        Returns:
        if false the piece cannot be moved because the space is occupied by another piece or it's going through the edge of the board

        Returns:
        if the move is legal to invert
